Georbis Γη Γῆ Gêᵒⁿ ᵍorbis ᵍurbis Kreis

𒆠 KIᵒ Geo "earth" 𓊖 𓈋 𓇾 𓈉 land …

𒆠 KIᵒ Gaia in 𒆠𒁺 kiᵒreⁿ կայարան kayaran > gare "station"

𒊹 ŠAR₂ ǦEOR Geo® kiššatum (“totality, world”)

♁ Gaia ⋍ geo ⋍ gu古gǔ ⋍ ge ⋍ ki ⋍ 'earthu ⏚ ⼟

𒆕𒋡𒊑 qaqari ᵈGeor 𒋡𒊑𒆕 •ᴳERDE

Γῆ Gêᵒⁿ Geon < ground

𒆠𒅔𒁺 ki-in-du kindu earth 𓈋 𒆠𒅔𒁯 kiʳin-dar kindar ground hole, crevice 𒃷 GAN₂ ground 𒃷 GAN₂ ≈ Geon in 𒇽𒃷𒁍 geometer agrimensor землеме́р zemlemér 𒇽𒃷𒁍 Geon.gid₂ geodéta геодези́ст geodesist

𒄀 GIᵒⁿ in 𒄀𒈾 gi.na QANÛ cane <> 𓇔 "South"
